document.full_text: geraldine ferraro, the democratic congresswoman who became the first woman on a major party presidential ticket as walter mondale's running mate in 1984, died on saturday at the age of 75, her family said.
document.title: geraldine ferraro, first woman on presidential ticket, dies
lines_and_colors: geraldine ferraro, the democratic congresswoman who became the first woman on a major party presidential ticket as walter mondale's running mate in 1984, died on saturday at the age of 75, her family said.
